security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' wss://*.workers.dev wss://localhost:*; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'

bundle.shortDescription: Secure remote access application with end-to-end encryption
bundle.longDescription: RemoShell is a modern secure remote access application that provides encrypted terminal sessions and file transfer between devices. Features a graphical interface for remote terminal access, file browsing, and device management. Uses WebRTC and QUIC for NAT traversal, QR code-based device pairing, and end-to-end encryption via the Noise Protocol.
